conclusion: Analyze the U-I graph for both the power source and the small light bulb.
The intersection point of line a and curve b represents the operating point of the circuit.
The intersection point is at U = 2 V and I = 2 A.
Output Power P_out = U × I = 2 V × 2 A = 4 W.
The total power of the power source is the product of the emf of the power source and the current.
The emf of the power source (when I = 0) is 3 V.
Total Power P_total = emf × I = 3 V × 2 A = 6 W.
The output power of the power source is 4 W.
The total power of the power source is 6 W.
